tweak.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to suddenly pull or twist something
tweak.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: She leant forward and tweaked both ends of his moustache.
tweak.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to make small changes to a machine, vehicle, or system in order to improve the way it works
tweak.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Maybe you should tweak a few sentences before you send in the report.
